summary: REQ-12/13/14 appear implemented: header now displays "Luxury Bazar" next to the logo as a single home link, document <title> is set to "Luxury Bazar", and footer copyright includes "Â© {currentYear} Luxury Bazar. All rights reserved.". One additional behavior (dynamic hostname-based UTM content for the caffeine.ai link) appears introduced but was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Dynamic UTM tracking parameter (utm_content) derived from window.location.hostname added to the caffeine.ai referral link.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 only asked to keep the existing caffeine.ai referral link unchanged; adding hostname-based UTM content is additional behavior not explicitly requested.
